content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>Steve Bower</origin> <pubdate>19940506</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>UtilityTelecom_EXCHANGE</title> <edition>1.0</edition> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <serinfo> <sername>NYNEX - Vermont Telephone Exchange boundaries-State of Vermont, with portions of adjoining states.</sername> <issue>1.0</issue> </serinfo> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Burlington, VT  05405-0106</pubplace> <publish>Steve Bower</publish> </pubinfo> <othercit>Tile Structure - STATE</othercit> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?layer=UtilityTelecom_EXCHANGE</onlink> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/dataware/default.cfm?layer=UtilityTelecom_EXCHANGE&mapit=yes</onlink> <onlink>http://maps.vcgi.org:8080/wmsconnector/com.esri.wms.Esrimap?servicename=DATAWARE_VCGI&VERSION=1.1.1&request=getmap&BBOX=-73.45416,42.72279,-71.46528,45.018356&SRS=EPSG:4326&LAYERS=UTILITY_EXCHANGE_POLY&WIDTH=300&HEIGHT=400&FORMAT=image/gif</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract> "The original coverage was digitized by UVM using our USGS-base Exchange maps filed with the Public Service Board.  All Exchanges and central office locations have NOT been verified as to correctness."  Quoted from transmittal letter with coverage from Allen Kieslich, (then) Staff Manager, Marketing & Technology. </abstract> <purpose>NYNEX - Vermont Telephone Exchange boundaries</purpose> <supplinf> Copies of the source maps are on file at 3 locations - Department of Public Service and Public Service Board, Montpelier NYNEX-Vermont headquarters, and 800 Hinesburg Road, South Burlington </supplinf> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>Unknown</caldate> <time>Unknown</time> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Publication Date</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>Complete</progress> <update>Unknown</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-73.454162</westbc> <eastbc>-71.465281</eastbc> <northbc>45.018361</northbc> <southbc>42.722789</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>ISO 19115 Topic Category</themekt> <themekey>utilitiesCommunication</themekey> </theme> <theme> <themekt>None</themekt> <themekey>NYNEX - Vermont Telephone Exchange boundaries</themekey> <themekey>nynex</themekey> <themekey>Exchange boundary</themekey> <themekey>telephone boundary</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>None</placekt> <placekey>State of Vermont, with portions of adjoining states.</placekey> <placekey>vermont</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst> NYNEX - Vermont assumes no responsibility or liability for the accuracy of the information contained in coverage UtilityTelecom_EXCHANGE. NYNEX - Vermont and VCGI are not accountable for any errors in or misuse of the data.  VCGI and the State of Vermont make no representations of any kind, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability or fitness of the data for a particular use, nor are any such warranties to be implied with respect to the data. </accconst> <useconst> According to Al Kieslich, some Exchanges have more than 1 central office or wire center, but in the coverage there is only one label point per polygon.  The label point locations are probably not indicative of the actual Exchange central office location.  Also, the external polygon ($Recno 1) has some data associated with respect to the data. </useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>VT Center for Geographic Information</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>Mailing and Physical Address</addrtype> <address>58 South Main Street, Suite 2</address> <city>Waterbury</city> <state>VT</state> <postal>05676</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>802/882-3000</cntvoice> <cnttdd>None</cnttdd> <cntfax>802/882-3001</cntfax> <hours>9am-5pm, M-F</hours> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://maps.vcgi.org:8080/wmsconnector/com.esri.wms.Esrimap?servicename=DATAWARE_VCGI&VERSION=1.1.1&request=getmap&BBOX=-73.45416,42.72279,-71.46528,45.018356&SRS=EPSG:4326&LAYERS=UTILITY_EXCHANGE_POLY&WIDTH=300&HEIGHT=400&FORMAT=image/gif</browsen> <browsed>GIF</browsed> <browset>GIF</browset> </browse> <secinfo> <secsys>N/A</secsys> <secclass>Unclassified</secclass> <sechandl>No Security Considerations</sechandl> </secinfo> <native>Arc/Info</native> <crossref> <citeinfo> <origin>Steve Bower</origin> <pubdate>19940506</pubdate> <pubtime>unknown</pubtime> <title>NYNEX - Vermont Telephone Exchange boundaries-State of Vermont, with portions of adjoining states.</title> <edition>1.0</edition> <geoform>vector digital data</geoform> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Burlington, VT  05405-0106</pubplace> <publish>Steve Bower</publish> </pubinfo> <othercit>UtilityTelecom_EXCHANGE</othercit> <onlink>http://www.vcgi.org/</onlink> </citeinfo> </crossref> </idinfo> <dataqual> <attracc> <attraccr> "All Exchanges and central office locations have NOT been verified as to correctness."
